page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: This is a mainly agricultural area with many farms such as Bluegate Farm,Hubbard's Hall Farm etc. On the farm where my Dad works there are six people who help.Their names are Mark Reson,Tony Matthews (my dad),Geoffry Bullhead,Bob Pain,Archie Lake and Archie Wilson.Archie Wilson owns half the farm and his brother owns the other half.They also own another farm at Stutton .The farm grows mainly corn, sugar beet,oil seed rape,potatoes and turnips.My Dad mainly does rolling, combining,ploughing, and potato picking. On the farm we have two international tractors and one deutsch. Altogether on the two farms there are cows, chickens and four dogs:There are cats with babies in some of the sheds. This farm is typical of the area.
